name: Ghastly Heat
description:
Ghastly Heat is game I made for the 24th TriJam.

The challenge was to make a game in 3 hours  and follow the theme of "Old School".

So I designed a game only using NES colours, 16 x 16 Pixel art and very simple controls and gameplay.

The goal is to get to the end of the level without falling in the level or getting hit by a ghost.

As this was made in 3 hours. It has a lot of issues, one being the terrible art ;P

I'd love to get some feed back on this 

Thanks and Enjoy.
